thread.title: We wonder what our parents think when they see us glued to our laptops
thread.title_full: We wonder what our parents think when they see us glued to our laptops

author: Team Social
title: We wonder what our parents think when they see us glued to our laptops
text:
We wonder what our parents think when they see us glued to our laptops, instagramming food without even tasting it and snapchatting everything.
But what if our parents did the same to us? How would we react if our parents were posting snaps of almost everything they did on Snapchat or Instagram?
Get a sense of what would it be like through this hilarious video by ‘ FilterCopy ‘. The 4-minute long video, titled ‘If Parents Behaved Like Us’, features veteran actors Rajat Kapoor and Sheeba Chaddha as the social media-obsessed, urban slang using parents.
Watch the rib-tickling video here:
